title: NoSleep Podcast S10 Escape the Dungeon Bonus
description:
For Friday the 13th we are proud to present this bonus episode featuring the story crafted by Peter Lewis for the episodes he hosted during the Escape the Black Farm tour in Feb/Mar of 2018.
  "Escape the Dungeon" written by Peter Lewis and performed by The NoSleep Players.
  Click here to learn more about the voice actors on The NoSleep Podcast  
 Click here to visit the home of Peter Lewis  
  Executive Producer & Host: David Cummings
 Audio adaptation produced by: Phil Michalski
 "Escape the Dungeon" illustration courtesy of Krista Neubert
